modName: YY Anim Replacer - Princess Horse Riding
summary:
This mod replaces horse riding animations with sidesaddle, a way of ladies riding.
The subtle change provides you more immersions and helps your role playing.
descriptionHtml:
[center][i]Do you know the sign of Chinese zodiac of 2014?
Take a guess. It's the horse!
So I decided to make something related to horses.[/i][/center]

[center][color=#d986b9][size=4][b]This mod replaces horse riding animations with sidesaddle, a way of ladies riding.
The subtle change provides you more immersions and helps your role playing.[/b][/size][/color][/center]
[heading][color=#d986b9]Features[/color][/heading][list]
[*]Sidesaddle makes your female character look elegant.
[*]Covering most of horse riding animations. Idle, Walk, Trot, Run, Sprint, Jump, Swim, Rear up, Mount and Dismount.
[*](T)BBP Compatible
[/list]
Downside:[list][*]Mounted combat is not covered. Sidesaddle doesn't suit for combat.
[*]All NPCs do the same animations. But it is rare to see NPC riding on a horse.[/list]
[heading][color=#d986b9][s]Quick[/s] Preview[/color][/heading][youtube]Ttn6ksCKBZI[/youtube][youtube]gCosorlnepY[/youtube]
[heading][color=#d986b9]Installation[/color][/heading][color=red]I strongly recommend you to use [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/1334/]MO[/url]/[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/1840/]BAIN[/url]/[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/modmanager/]NMM[/url] to install.[/color]

[MO and NMM user]
Activate and follow the instructions of installation wizard.

[BAIN User]
Open Installers tab, right click, select "Wizard", and follow the instructions of installation wizard.

[Manual]
Open the archive, choose exactly one folder, rename it "data", then copy "data" folder to your "Skyrim" directory.
Each hkx file should be placed in "Skyrim/data/meshes/actors/character/animations/horse_rider/",
but only "paired_mount.hkx" and "paired_dismount.hkx" should be placed in "Skyrim/data/meshes/sharedkillmoves/human&horse/", because those two are paired animation.
[img]http://static-1.nexusmods.com/15/mods/110/images/50598-1-1391268000.gif[/img]

[heading][color=#d986b9]Uninstallation[/color][/heading]This mod has no esp, no script, no havok behavior, so never dirty your save file.
[color=red]You can uninstall it whenever you want.[/color]

[MO and NMM user]
Simply deactivate this mod.

[BAIN User]
Open Installers tab, right click, select "Uninstall".

[Manual Uninstallation]
Delete the files you installed.

[heading][color=#d986b9]Known Issues[/color][/heading][Critical Issues]
None. I did test play for an hour. There was no critical issues such as CTD.
Though this is the first mod which replaces/modifies horse riding animation, I think. So unexpected issues might occur.
If you find weird behaviors, please report at forum. Showing pictures or videos would be greatly appreciated.

[Minor Issues]
-[color=red]All NPCs do the same animations. In short, male characters also ride in sidesaddle.[/color]
If you think this brakes the immersion, please do not install this mod.
Or, there is a solution that can separate the most of animations into male and female. Check [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/11811/]FNIS'[/url] page.

-[color=red]If you apply FNIS' "Gender Specific Animations" option to this mod, you'll see T-pose on the horse occasionally.[/color]
It seems quite at random for me. I have no idea of how to fix it.

-There are 1 frame jitters in the transitions between mount and idle, also idle and dismount.
